Santorini.title: Volcano & Hot Springs Tour
Santorini.desc: Discover the enchanting side of Santorini with an unforgettable boat trip to the volcanic islands and the natural hot springs. Departing from the old port of Fira aboard a traditional wooden boat, you’ll sail towards Nea Kameni — the active volcano that shaped the island’s breathtaking landscape. With your experienced guide, hike up to the crater’s edge to witness the steaming vents and feel the raw energy of the earth beneath your feet. The tour continues to Palea Kameni, where you can enjoy a relaxing swim in the warm, mineral-rich waters of the hot springs, known for their therapeutic properties. As you sail back, take in the stunning panorama of whitewashed houses clinging to the cliffs of the caldera — a view that truly captures the spirit of the Aegean. A perfect blend of nature, adventure, and relaxation in one iconic Santorini experience.

Santorini.desc: Enjoy the famous Oia sunset from a private terrace with wine tasting.

Mykonos.title: Walking Tour of Mykonos Town
Mykonos.desc: Discover Little Venice, the windmills, and the charm of Mykonos Town.

Mykonos.title: Delos Island Archaeological Tour
Mykonos.desc: Visit the sacred island of Delos, one of Greece’s most important ancient sites.

Crete.desc: Step into the world of the Minoans and explore Crete’s ancient history.

Crete.desc: Stroll through Crete’s two most beautiful Venetian harbors.

Crete.desc: Stroll through Crete’s two most beautiful Venetian harbors.

Santorini.title: Lindos Acropolis Excursion
Santorini.desc: Discover the ancient acropolis of Lindos and the picturesque village below.

Spetses.title: Horse Carriage Tour of Spetses Town
Spetses.desc: Experience the charm of Spetses with a traditional horse-drawn carriage ride through the elegant streets of Dapia and the Old Harbor, lined with neoclassical mansions and bougainvillea.

Spetses.title: Historical Walk & Bouboulina Museum
Spetses.desc: Take a guided walk through the island’s historic quarter and visit the Bouboulina Museum — home of the legendary heroine of the Greek War of Independence.

Poros.title: Poros Town Walking Tour
Poros.desc: Stroll along the scenic waterfront of Poros Town, admire the neoclassical architecture, and climb up to the famous Clock Tower for panoramic views of the harbor and surrounding islands.

Poros.title: Monastery of Zoodochos Pigi Visit
Poros.desc: Discover the beautiful 18th-century monastery nestled in a pine forest overlooking the sea. Learn about its history and enjoy tranquil moments away from the bustling port.

Hydra.title: Hydra Town & Coastal Walk
Hydra.desc: Explore the enchanting harbor of Hydra, a car-free island where time stands still. Walk along the coastal path past stone mansions, small chapels, and crystal-clear coves.

Hydra.title: Hydra Art & Heritage Tour
Hydra.desc: Visit the Historical Archives Museum and local art galleries that showcase Hydra’s unique role as a cultural hub for artists and seafarers.

Mykonos.title: Walking Tour of Mykonos Town
Mykonos.desc: Enjoy a guided walk through the charming narrow streets of Mykonos Town, exploring Little Venice, the iconic windmills, and the whitewashed houses that make this island so photogenic.

Mykonos.title: Delos Island Archaeological Tour
Mykonos.desc: Sail to the sacred island of Delos, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and birthplace of Apollo and Artemis. Visit the ancient temples, mosaics, and the Terrace of the Lions.

Kusadasi.title: Ancient Ephesus & the House of Virgin Mary
Kusadasi.desc: Visit one of the best-preserved ancient cities of the Eastern Mediterranean — Ephesus. Walk through marble streets, admire the Library of Celsus, and visit the peaceful House of the Virgin Mary.

Kusadasi.title: Ephesus & Local Market Experience
Kusadasi.desc: Combine your visit to ancient Ephesus with a guided stop at a local bazaar. Enjoy shopping for leather goods, carpets, and Turkish delights while exploring vibrant Kusadasi life.

Patmos.title: Monastery of St. John & Cave of the Apocalypse
Patmos.desc: Discover the spiritual heart of Patmos. Visit the 11th-century Monastery of St. John and the sacred Cave of the Apocalypse, where St. John is said to have written the Book of Revelation.

Patmos.title: Scenic Tour of Patmos Villages
Patmos.desc: Enjoy a panoramic drive around the island with stops at picturesque villages and beaches. Experience the serenity of this small yet enchanting island.

Rhodes.title: Medieval City of Rhodes Walking Tour
Rhodes.desc: Step back in time with a walking tour through the medieval Old Town of Rhodes — a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Visit the Palace of the Grand Master and stroll down the Street of the Knights.

Rhodes.title: Lindos Acropolis & Village
Rhodes.desc: Travel along the scenic east coast to the village of Lindos. Climb to the ancient Acropolis for breathtaking views over St. Paul's Bay and explore the narrow alleys of the whitewashed town.

Santorini.title: Volcano & Hot Springs Cruise
Santorini.desc: Embark on a short boat trip to Nea Kameni volcano and hike up to the crater for spectacular caldera views. Then enjoy a relaxing swim in the sulfur-rich hot springs at Palea Kameni.

Santorini.title: Oia Village & Sunset Experience
Santorini.desc: Visit the picturesque village of Oia, famous for its blue-domed churches and stunning sunset views. Explore art galleries and traditional whitewashed alleys before watching the sun dip into the Aegean.
